title: RozeePk Jobs Scraper
description: Scrape jobs from Rozee.pk. Provide either keyword/location OR a RozeePk search URL. Fast extraction with JSON-LD parsing and stealth features.

startUrl.title: Start URL
startUrl.description: Start scraping from a specific RozeePk search URL. If provided, this overrides the Keyword field.
startUrl.sectionDescription: Either provide a Start URL OR use the Keyword field below.

keyword.title: Keyword
keyword.description: Job search keyword(s), e.g., 'Software Developer', 'Marketing Manager'.

results_wanted.title: Maximum Jobs
results_wanted.description: Maximum number of jobs to scrape.

max_pages.title: Maximum Pages
max_pages.description: Maximum number of search result pages to visit.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy Configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Proxy settings for the scraper. Datacenter proxies are recommended.
